headline: LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (LYB): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on LyondellBasell Industries N.V. on DeepValue Capital’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LYB. LyondellBasell Industries N.V.’s share was trading at $62.88 as of July 28th. LYB’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.76 and 16.45 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: LyondellBasell announces quarterly dividend
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) today announced it has declared a dividend of $1.37 per share, to be paid to shareholders on Sept. 2, 2025, with an ex-dividend and record date of Aug. 25, 2025. About LyondellBasell We are LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) – a leader in the global chemical industry creating solutions for everyday sustainable living. Through advanced technology and focused investments, we are enabling a circular and low carbon economy. Acr
